articles.title: Tennessee authorizes counties to move through COVID vaccination phases ‘as supply allows’ - WKRN News 2
articles.description: Tennessee’s state health department is expected to announce Friday that it will move into the next phase of its COVID vaccination plan, according to officials in two Middle Tennessee counties.
articles.content:
NASHVILLE, Tenn. (WKRN) Tennessee counties can now individually move through the COVID vaccination phases “as vaccine supply allows,” the state’s health department announced Friday.
